divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and i we were driving home on us 23 in fenton michigan ,thats when we observed bright lights from far away as we got closer this object was about 200 feet above the freeway going in the same direction and we were, surprized. To see this UFO just as i was going to stop and take photos it reversed itself and it took off going north towards flint michigan and i called 911 and reported
Summary: it was big with no noise and bright lights
trends: There has been one other sighting in -fenton
There was one other sighting in -fenton on or around October 28th 2013
